thread.title: Universal's The Mummy reboot might cast a female mummy - Movies
thread.title_full: Universal's The Mummy reboot might cast a female mummy - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Ben Lee
title: Universal's The Mummy reboot might cast a female mummy - Movies
text: Universal could be heading in a different direction with The Mummy's reboot.The upcoming movie might see the mummy villain be female with a different background, rather than male as in the previous films. According to The Hollywood Reporter, the gender of the mummy is dependent on the casting.Earlier this year, the reboot of The Mummy was delayed until March 24, 2017.Directed by Alex Kurtzman, the project is said to be taking place in the modern day, and is planned to be part of a movie monster franchise.The Mummy was first released in 1932, before it was remade in 1999 with Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz in the lead roles and Arnold Vosloo playing the titular mummy.Watch a trailer for the 1999 movie below:
